name: O protetor da Floresta
description:
Developed during GameJam+, in The protector of the forest, curupira uses his skills to deal with hunters who try to hurt forest animals, finish off enemies and protect the maned wolf

Controls:

Move: W, A, S, D

Attack: left mouse button

Credits:

Thiago: programer

Yuri: Game design

Vinicius: Game design and project management

João Pedro: art

Davi: art
